page.title: 13NOTABLEEVENTS APPLETONWISKE
page.content: On Sunday 14th April 1985 Appleton held its first Half Marathon and Fun Run.The events were held to purchase purchase the recreation field.The Fun Run cost Â£2.50 for children and Â£3.50 for adults to enter.The Half Marathon was only open to adults.About 370 runners took part ,setting off from the school.Everyone finishing was given a medal and a certificate.The winner Paul Harker of Darlington to 69min.27secs.It is hoped that the two runs will become an annual event.On 4th July the school P.T.A. held a Summer Fair and Barbecue in aid of school funds.It was a sunny evening and there were pony rides,tombola, superbounce matress,raffle,cake,plant and other stalls.Childrens stalls included treasure,assemble the cube, and many others.It raised Â£238. By David Wilson & Andrew Gardiner
